display_long_description:
**Tidal Tactics** – Get onboard captain, for the most immersive and explosive Ship-Battle ever!! 🚢🌊 Transform you living room into a battlefield and literally bomb your floor to discover & destroy the hidden enemy ships. 
- Single Player and Local Multiplayer (PvP) available 

[media]

#BreakYourFloor

**PLAY SINGLE PLAYER** 🔥
- Challenge a self-evolving entity that comes back smarter after every defeat

**LOCAL MULTIPLAYER (PvP)** 🏃‍♀️‍➡️vs🏃‍♂️ 
- Challenge friends or foes to a battle in your very room or backyard and become the smartest captain! 

[media]

**KEY FEATURES**
- 💥Turn your room into a battlefield and destroy your floor
- 🏃Move through your space to manage resources and recharge your weapons
- 💣Choose from a range of classic weapons (Sonar, Airstrike and a new high-damage hammer!)

[media]

**REQUIREMENTS**
- 📏 Room-scale requirement: 100 sq ft minimum

**NOTE**  
- Your feedback helps us improve. If you’ve enjoyed Tidal Tactics, please take a moment to leave a review!
